verses.verse: And <WG1161> the <WG3588> apostles <WG652> and <WG2532> brethren <WG80> that were <WG5607> in <WG2596> Judea <WG2449> heard <WG191> that <WG3754> the <WG3588> Gentiles <WG1484> had also <WG2532> received <WG1209> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> of God. <WG2316>

And <WG2532> when <WG3753> Peter <WG4074> was come up <WG305> to <WG1519> Jerusalem, <WG2414> they <WG3588> that were of <WG1537> the circumcision <WG4061> contended <WG1252> with <WG4314> him, <WG846>
saying, <WG3004> Thou wentest in <WG1525> to <WG4314> men <WG435> uncircumcised, <WG203> and <WG2532> didst eat with <WG4906> them. <WG846>
But <WG1161> Peter <WG4074> rehearsed the matter from the beginning, <WG756> and expounded <WG1620> it by order <WG2517> unto them, <WG846> saying, <WG3004>

I <WG1473> was <WG2252> in <WG1722> the city <WG4172> of Joppa <WG2445> praying: <WG4336> and <WG2532> in <WG1722> a trance <WG1611> I saw <WG1492> a vision, <WG3705> A certain <WG5100> vessel <WG4632> descend, <WG2597> as it had been <WG5613> a great <WG3173> sheet, <WG3607> let down <WG2524> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> by four <WG5064> corners; <WG746> and <WG2532> it came <WG2064> even to <WG891> me: <WG1700>

Upon <WG1519> the which <WG3739> when I had fastened mine eyes, <WG816> I considered, <WG2657> and <WG2532> saw <WG1492> fourfooted beasts <WG5074> of the <WG3588> earth, <WG1093> and <WG2532> wild beasts, <WG2342> and <WG2532> creeping things, <WG2062> and <WG2532> fowls <WG4071> of the <WG3588> air. <WG3772>
And <WG1161> I heard <WG191> a voice <WG5456> saying <WG3004> unto me, <WG3427> Arise, <WG450> Peter; <WG4074> slay <WG2380> and <WG2532> eat. <WG5315>

But <WG1161> I said, <WG2036> Not so, <WG3365> Lord: <WG2962> for <WG3754> nothing <WG3956> common <WG2839> or <WG2228> unclean <WG169> hath at any time <WG3763> entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> my <WG3450> mouth. <WG4750>

But <WG1161> the voice <WG5456> answered <WG611> me <WG3427> again <WG1537> <WG1208> from <WG1537> heaven, <WG3772> What <WG3739> God <WG2316> hath cleansed, <WG2511> that call not thou common. <WG2840> <WG3361> <WG4771>
And <WG1161> this <WG5124> was done <WG1096> three times: <WG5151> and <WG2532> all <WG537> were drawn up <WG385> again <WG3825> into <WG1519> heaven. <WG3772>

And, <WG2532> behold, <WG2400> immediately <WG1824> there were three <WG5140> men <WG435> already come <WG2186> unto <WG1909> the <WG3588> house <WG3614> where <WG1722> <WG3739> I was, <WG2252> sent <WG649> from <WG575> Caesarea <WG2542> unto <WG4314> me. <WG3165>

And <WG1161> the <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> bade <WG2036> me <WG3427> go with <WG4905> them, <WG846> nothing <WG3367> doubting. <WG1252> Moreover <WG1161> these <WG3778> six <WG1803> brethren <WG80> <WG2532> accompanied <WG2064> <WG4862> me, <WG1698> and <WG2532> we entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> man's <WG435> house: <WG3624>

And <WG5037> he showed <WG518> us <WG2254> how <WG4459> he had seen <WG1492> an angel <WG32> in <WG1722> his <WG846> house, <WG3624> which stood <WG2476> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> Send <WG649> men <WG435> to <WG1519> Joppa, <WG2445> and <WG2532> call for <WG3343> Simon, <WG4613> whose surname is <WG1941> Peter; <WG4074>
Who <WG3739> shall tell <WG2980> thee <WG4571> words, <WG4487> whereby <WG1722> <WG3739> thou <WG4771> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> thy <WG4675> house <WG3624> shall be saved. <WG4982>

And <WG1161> as I <WG3165> began <WG756> to speak, <WG2980> the <WG3588> Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> fell <WG1968> on <WG1909> them, <WG846> as <WG5618> <WG2532> on <WG1909> us <WG2248> at <WG1722> the beginning. <WG746>

Then <WG1161> remembered <WG3415> I the <WG3588> word <WG4487> of the Lord, <WG2962> how <WG5613> that he said, <WG3004> John <WG2491> indeed <WG3303> baptized <WG907> with water; <WG5204> but <WG1161> ye <WG5210> shall be baptized <WG907> with <WG1722> the Holy <WG40> Ghost. <WG4151>

Forasmuch <WG1487> then <WG3767> as God <WG2316> gave <WG1325> them <WG846> the <WG3588> like <WG2470> gift <WG1431> as <WG5613> he did <WG2532> unto us, <WG2254> who believed <WG4100> on <WG1909> the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ; <WG5547> what <WG5101> was <WG2252> I, that I could <WG1415> withstand <WG2967> God? <WG2316>

When <WG1161> they heard <WG191> these things, <WG5023> they held their peace, <WG2270> and <WG2532> glorified <WG1392> God, <WG2316> saying, <WG3004> Then <WG686> hath <WG1065> God <WG2316> also <WG2532> to the <WG3588> Gentiles <WG1484> granted <WG1325> repentance <WG3341> unto <WG1519> life. <WG2222>

Now <WG3767> they which were scattered abroad <WG1289> <WG3303> upon <WG575> the <WG3588> persecution <WG2347> that arose <WG1096> about <WG1909> Stephen <WG4736> traveled <WG1330> as far as <WG2193> Phoenicia, <WG5403> and <WG2532> Cyprus, <WG2954> and <WG2532> Antioch, <WG490> preaching <WG2980> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> to none <WG3367> but <WG1508> unto the Jews <WG2453> only. <WG3440>

And <WG1161> some <WG5100> of <WG1537> them <WG846> were <WG2258> men <WG435> of Cyprus <WG2953> and <WG2532> Cyrene, <WG2956> which, <WG3748> when they were come <WG1525> to <WG1519> Antioch, <WG490> spake <WG2980> unto <WG4314> the <WG3588> Grecians, <WG1675> preaching <WG2097> the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Jesus. <WG2424>

And <WG2532> the hand <WG5495> of the Lord <WG2962> was <WG2258> with <WG3326> them: <WG846> and <WG5037> a great <WG4183> number <WG706> believed, <WG4100> and turned <WG1994> unto <WG1909> the <WG3588> Lord. <WG2962>

Then <WG1161> tidings of these things came <WG3056> <WG4012> <WG846> <WG191> unto <WG1519> the <WG3588> ears <WG3775> of the <WG3588> church <WG1577> which <WG3588> was in <WG1722> Jerusalem: <WG2414> and <WG2532> they sent forth <WG1821> Barnabas, <WG921> that he should go <WG1330> as far as <WG2193> Antioch. <WG490>

Who, <WG3739> when he came, <WG3854> and <WG2532> had seen <WG1492> the <WG3588> grace <WG5485> of God, <WG2316> was glad, <WG5463> and <WG2532> exhorted <WG3870> them all, <WG3956> that with purpose <WG4286> of heart <WG2588> they would cleave unto <WG4357> the <WG3588> Lord. <WG2962>

For <WG3754> he was <WG2258> a good <WG18> man, <WG435> and <WG2532> full <WG4134> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> and <WG2532> of faith: <WG4102> and <WG2532> much <WG2425> people <WG3793> was added <WG4369> unto the <WG3588> Lord. <WG2962>
Then <WG1161> departed <WG1831> Barnabas <WG921> to <WG1519> Tarsus, <WG5019> for to seek <WG327> Saul: <WG4569>

And <WG2532> when he had found <WG2147> him, <WG846> he brought <WG71> him <WG846> unto <WG1519> Antioch. <WG490> And <WG1161> it came to pass, <WG1096> that a whole <WG3650> year <WG1763> they <WG846> assembled themselves <WG4863> with <WG1722> the <WG3588> church, <WG1577> and <WG2532> taught <WG1321> much <WG2425> people. <WG3793> And <WG5037> the <WG3588> disciples <WG3101> were called <WG5537> Christians <WG5546> first <WG4412> in <WG1722> Antioch. <WG490>
And <WG1161> in <WG1722> these <WG5025> days <WG2250> came <WG2718> prophets <WG4396> from <WG575> Jerusalem <WG2414> unto <WG1519> Antioch. <WG490>

And <WG1161> there stood up <WG450> one <WG1520> of <WG1537> them <WG846> named <WG3686> Agabus, <WG13> and signified <WG4591> by <WG1223> the <WG3588> spirit <WG4151> that there should <WG3195> be <WG1510> great <WG3173> dearth <WG3042> throughout <WG1909> all <WG3650> the <WG3588> world: <WG3625> which <WG3748> <WG2532> came to pass <WG1096> in the days of <WG1909> Claudius <WG2804> Caesar. <WG2541>

Then <WG1161> the <WG3588> disciples, <WG3101> every man <WG1538> according to <WG2531> his ability, <WG5100> <WG2141> determined <WG3724> to send <WG3992> relief <WG1519> <WG1248> unto the <WG3588> brethren <WG80> which dwelt <WG2730> in <WG1722> Judea: <WG2449>
Which <WG3739> also <WG2532> they did, <WG4160> and sent <WG649> it to <WG4314> the <WG3588> elders <WG4245> by <WG1223> the hands <WG5495> of Barnabas <WG921> and <WG2532> Saul. <WG4569>
